name: Pulp Fiction
description: Vincent and Jules kill people and eat kahuna burgers

name: Inglorious Basterds
description: Aldo 'the Apache' Raine gathers a squad of jews to scalp Nazis

name: Blinkende Lygter
description: Four gangsters steal a fortune from their boss and hide out in a small farmhouse, where each comes to the realization they would like to stay there and open a small restaurant.
